description: Manages an Azure Data Lake Store.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

EncryptionState.description: Is Encryption enabled on this Data Lake Store Account? Possible values are `Enabled` or `Disabled`. Defaults to `Enabled`.

EncryptionType.description: The Encryption Type used for this Data Lake Store Account. Currently can be set to `ServiceManaged` when `encryption_state` is `Enabled` - and must be a blank string when it's Disabled.

FirewallAllowAzureIps.description: are Azure Service IP's allowed through the firewall? Possible values are `Enabled` and `Disabled`. Defaults to `Enabled.`.

FirewallState.description: the state of the Firewall. Possible values are `Enabled` and `Disabled`. Defaults to `Enabled.`.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Lake Store. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Has to be between 3 to 24 characters.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Data Lake Store.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

Tier.description: The monthly commitment tier for Data Lake Store. Accepted values are `Consumption`, `Commitment_1TB`, `Commitment_10TB`, `Commitment_100TB`, `Commitment_500TB`, `Commitment_1PB` or `Commitment_5PB`.
